messages.title: Tory threats to Montgomeryshire
messages.content: Traffic Chaos - The Tories will slash the transport budget - Newtown bypass is at real risk. Education cuts - Our schools already get £600 less per pupil than in England. The Tories want to slash another £277 off the budget. Local children deserve better. More windfarms and pylons - The Tory manifesto promises even more windfarms.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The alternative for a better Wales
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to delivering the Newtown bypass, Close the £600 spending gap in our schools, Ensure every penny in the NHS is spent well.

issues.education: Our schools already get £600 less per pupil than in England. The Tories want to slash another £277 off the budget. Local children deserve better.
issues.environment: The Tory manifesto promises even more windfarms. Welsh Lib Dems want instead to concentrate new windfarms out at sea, preserving our local countryside.
issues.health: Ensure every penny in the NHS is spent well.

images.caption: Kirsty Williams - Leader of the Welsh Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet criticizes the Tory party's policies affecting Montgomeryshire and promotes the Welsh Liberal Democrats as the alternative, focusing on issues of transportation, education, and the environment.
